title: The Remains of the Day
author: Kazuo Ishiguro
description: A novel about a butler in post-war England who reflects on his life of service, missed opportunities, and the nature of dignity.

title: The Best of Greg Egan: 20 Stories of Hard Science Fiction
author: Greg Egan
description: A collection of mind-bending short stories exploring themes of mathematics, physics, and artificial intelligence.

title: Exhalation: Stories
author: Ted Chiang
description: A collection of science fiction short stories that explore humanity's place in the universe and the nature of consciousness.

title: The Elephant in the Brain: Hidden Motives in Everyday Life
author: Kevin Simler and Robin Hanson
description: An exploration of the hidden, self-interested motives behind our altruistic and social behaviors.

title: Station Eleven
author: Emily St. John Mandel
description: A novel set in a post-apocalyptic world, following a troupe of actors and musicians as they travel between settlements.

title: The Mind-Body Problem
author: Rebecca Goldstein
description: A philosophical novel that explores the conflict between emotion and intellect through the eyes of a young female graduate student.

title: Superintelligence: Paths, Dangers, Strategies
author: Nick Bostrom
description: A book that makes the case for the potential dangers and existential risks of developing artificial superintelligence.

title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
author: Douglas Adams
description: A comedic science fiction series that follows the adventures of the last surviving human after the demolition of Earth.
